snippet: Keeping production of Boeing’s latest jet, the 777X, in Washington State may now depend on whether workers agree to the company’s wage offer.
abstract: Washington State Legislature passes measure to extend nearly $9 billion in tax breaks for Boeing through 2040 in effort to entice company to locate production of its newest jet in Seattle area.
lead_paragraph: Keeping production of Boeing’s latest jet, the 777X, in Washington State may now depend on whether workers agree to the company’s wage offer.

headline.main: Washington State Clears Boeing Tax Breaks
headline.print_headline: Washington State Clears Boeing Tax Breaks
